org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.workflow

Class GenericWorkFlowAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.BaseFormAction
        • org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.SearchFormAction
          • org.egov.infra.web.struts.actions.workflow.GenericWorkFlowAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.interceptor.ParameterNameAware, com.opensymphony.xwork2.interceptor.ValidationAware, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<Object>, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ParameterAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware

    public abstract class GenericWorkFlowAction
extends SearchFormAction
    Generic WorkFlow Action. Can be extended by any action class that intends to provide Work flow functionality.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getModel

        public abstract StateAware getModel()

      • prepareQuery

        public SearchQuery prepareQuery(String sortField,
                                String sortOrder)
        Specified by:
        prepareQuery in class SearchFormAction
        Parameters:
        sortField - the field on which data is to be sorted. This will be same as the value of "property" attribute in display:column tag (when sortable=true and user clicks on the column to sort it). In case no sorting is required, this parameter will be passed as null.
        sortOrder - the sort order (asc/desc)
        Returns:
        the query to be used for fetching the search results.

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.Preparable
        Overrides:
        prepare in class BaseFormAction

      • getAmountRule

        protected BigDecimal getAmountRule()
        Implementations must override this method based on their object's value that needs to be used in workflow
        Returns:
        the value that needs to be compared in the Amount rule table against FromAmount and ToAmount

      • getAdditionalRule

        protected String getAdditionalRule()
        Implementations must override this method to get additional rule for workflow.
        Returns:
        the value that needs to be compared in the matrix table against Additional rule

      • getWorkFlowDepartment

        protected String getWorkFlowDepartment()
        Implementations must override this method to achieve department wise workflow.
        Returns:
        the value that needs to be compared in the matrix table against Department.

      • getValidActions

        public List<String> getValidActions()
        Used to get valid actions that needs to be performed Based on these value workflow buttons will be rendered

      • getNextAction

        public String getNextAction()
        Used to get next action If the nextAction value is END then approval Information won't be shown on the UI.

        protected String getPendingActions()
        This parameter is used to get matrix object Implementations must override this method to get pendingActions

        the value needs to be compared against matrix table pendingActions
